name: Stylish with test.davelevy.info 1
description: This style amends two paragraphs in the text of the home page of test.davelevy.info

user.name: Dave from Deptford
user.about: I do politics, economics, technology, & travel. I am a Brit, Londoner, married, & father. I blog quite a bit. I have a github site at https://github.com/dfl1955, my other sites can be found at http://davelevy.cc/.

additional_info: This is version 1.0, its purpose is as a training exercise to determine how to use stylish. It's unlikely to have any reuse.
